title: SOLD (2/3): baker's dozen lower grade T207s (ALL SOLD or withdrawn)
author: frohme

posts.post_title: SOLD (2/3): baker's dozen lower grade T207s (ALL SOLD or withdrawn)
posts.post_content:
All but a few sold - remainder taken down - going to auction.  Thank you all for looking

Second of at least three installments of T207 FS threads for early 2021...

For sale - a number of raw T207s, mostly collector grade.  See [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/album.php?albumid=1110[/url] for the album (mouse-over images for description/price)

Open to offers on any, or the lot - I will generally be very flexible on these.  There are several types of cards in here

Anonymous Recruits (2) Both Sold
